website_summaries.verdict: This USB-powered humidifier offers a pulse interval mode and also works great as a nightlight.
pros: fits well in a cup holder
Features both continuous and interval spray modes
7 color LED works well as a nightlight
Shuts off after 4 or 8 hours, depending on mode
cons: Not for use with aromatherapy oils

customer_reviews.title: Very protable!!
customer_reviews.text: had expected to be a bigger size but its quite small and cute!! Its portable and easily installed anywhere you like it to be. the best part is the mist comes immediately after its plugged in. Very easy to use, Has a coloring effect, unlike other standard humidifiers. Keeps the place moist around it and no dry air for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Doby

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this miniature. Good quality for your money. Love the colors and so quiet
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great little humidifier. It does leak a bit, not sure if it’s just mine. I put a little towel underneath it and that solves it. We were at a Disney World for a week and this worked so well! Besides the little leak of course
customer_reviews.author: Van VanDerlin

customer_reviews.title: Junk, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this negative stars if I could. It worked great for one night, then without warning stopped working. Water poured out of the USB plug in. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the product because as soon as I plugged it in it works for about 10 minutes overheated and it never worked again so I am returning it back to Amazon.Because the whole product burnt down the same day
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome humidifier. Mist comes out quickly. I used it both in my bedroom and living room. The best part is it is portable and easy to handle. Once you understand how to use it, you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ayush

customer_reviews.title: Need to holding change anytime when have to use item
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my husband father day and he love it!
customer_reviews.author: Somsawai

customer_reviews.title: Mini Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: this little gadget works great for any area you move it to, love that i can also use oils in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Epplin

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little guy!
customer_reviews.text: Took this humidifier on a 7 day conference to Vegas, knowing that the air would be dry and there way a possibility that side effects would affect me. I filled it up each night before bed and it kept producing mist until morning. While the mist isn't necessarily a lot, it definitely helped combat the side effects of the dry air!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does not work sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Does not work sometimes, specially when you keep it running for 4-5 hrs
customer_reviews.author: prvn

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent trip to the desert. I used it in my hotel room at night and it was helpful for the dry air.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really thought it was rechargeable. Would be great if I didn't have to plug it in
customer_reviews.author: rana

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 2 days and it stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

product_meta.title: YinQin 230ML Portable USB Mini Air Humidifier 7 Color LED Lights Changing Mini Humidifier For Office Desk Bedroom Home Babies Kids Cars Cool Mist Mini Humidifier Travel Humidifier Quiet (White)
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :2.5 x 2.5 x 5.7 inches; 5 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :May 26, 2018
 * Manufacturer :YinQin
 * ASIN :B07DB6KNW2

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #498,977 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)  *  #621 inHumidifiers 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:3.7 out of 5 stars42 ratings
feature_bullets: 💗 Mini size and lightweight air humidifier, perfect for use in babies, kids, office, living room, car or travel easily. you can enjoy your humidifier anywhere and improve your life quality.

💗 2 Mist Modes: Ultrasonic continuous spray and Interval spray mode (spray 3 seconds and then stop 2 seconds become a cycle), Click again to turn off the spray. Ultrasonic high frequency atomization, Refresh skin and can be taken as a skin care, keep skin healthy and moist, reducing radiation.

💗 7 Color LED Changing Light For Your Choice: Press and hold the button 1.5 seconds, turn on 7-color auto changing mode. Press and hold button 1.5 seconds again, LED color lock (lock in any color when see it). Press and hold the switch 1.5 seconds again, turn off the light.
💗 Powered by USB charger, The mini mist humidifier can work just only in the case of power supply,such as USB adapter (500mA - 1A), The USB interface of computer, laptop, power bank.

💗 Portable humidifier, Auto Shut Off Function: 4 and 8 hour automatic shut-off Intelligent protection. once the water runs out, it will be auto shut-off to protect the device. No heat involved, no risk of burns, Quiet operation.
